com.epimorphics.lda.routing
Class DefaultRouter

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.routing.DefaultRouter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Router
public class DefaultRouter
extends Object
implements Router

The default router is a wrapper around a MatchSearcher, qv. The adaption is to return a Match object and to uplift the bindings. The Router also tracks the URI templates associated with ItemTemplates.

Author:
eh

register

public void register(String context,
                     String ut,
                     APIEndpoint ep)
Register the endpoint ep associated with the URI template ut. Also record the association between the item template (if any) and that URI template, for use in findItemURIPath.

Specified by:
register in interface Router
ut - the path template, relative server root
ep - the api implementation
